product_name: Black Diamond Nitron Screwgate Locking Carabiner
long_description: Carry a couple of the lightweight Black Diamond Nitron Screwgate locking carabiners to secure yourself to an anchor before belaying your buddy up. Hot-forged construction gives the carabiner precise shaping and detailing to ease handling; small ridges along the spine give your fingers something to grip. Hot-forging process allows the metal to be moved around and formed into intricate shapes; these shapes can ease handling and reduce weight. The Black Diamond Nitron Screwgate locking carabiner features a keylock gate that won't snag on protection, slings or bolt hangers.
short_description: Carry a couple of the lightweight Black Diamond Nitron Screwgate locking carabiners to secure yourself to an anchor before belaying your buddy up.
